task: Attached is an annotated mouse brain AnnData object with cell type annotations stored in `adata.obs['predicted_cell_type']`. For each canonical oligodendrocyte marker gene (Olig1, Sox10, Mbp, Mog, Aspa, Hapln2) compute its expression separation statistic using AUROC of expression in 'Oligodendrocyte' vs all other cell types. Return a JSON object with fields: per_gene_stats (list of objects with 'gene' and 'auroc' fields for each of the 6 genes), mean_auroc (the average AUROC across all genes).

scoring.description: Pass if ≥70 % of canonical markers have AUROC ≥ 0.8 and the mean AUROC ≥ 0.85, reflecting visually distinct violin-plot separation.
